testcase.classname: Test to Login to Mercury Tours and Book A Flight
testcase.name: Login to Mercury Tours
testcase.system-out: Given I am on the Mercury Tours Home Page...................................passed When I enter credentials mercury and mercury................................passed And I click Sign In Button..................................................passed Then I am navigated to Flight Finder page...................................passed When I click one way flight.................................................passed And I search for flights from Sydney to London..............................passed And I click first class service.............................................passed And I click Find Flights Button.............................................passed Then I am navigated to Select Flight page...................................passed And Flight information has text Sydney to London............................passed When I click the continue button............................................passed Then I am navigated to Book Flight page.....................................passed When I enter details Hitesh Bhugra and 123456...............................passed And I click Ticketless Travel Checkbox......................................passed And I click Secure Purchase Button..........................................passed Then I am navigated to Flight Confirmation page.............................passed
